titleStmt.title: A nevv instuction [sic] of plowing and setting of corne, handled in manner of a dialogue betweene a ploughman and a scholler Wherein is proued plainely that plowing and setting, is much more profitable and lesse chargeable, than plowing and sowing. By Edvvard Maxey. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Maxey, Edward, Gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Felix Kyngston, dwelling in Pater noster Rowe, ouer against the signe of the Checker,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A new instruction of plowing and setting of corne.
Some pages closely cropped, affecting marginal print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
